title: Sending emails
content: I have been unable to forward any messages or send any email messages. It is happening in both my lap top and desktop computers. The lap top worked fine until a couple or days ago and now is is just like the desk top--unable to send messages to anyone. The window opens to send but there is no send arrow or ability to send anything!!
